Package entity

Class OfficerApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.OfficerApplication
  • public class OfficerApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity class representing an officer's application to be assigned to a BTO project. This class tracks the application process for officers requesting to work on specific projects, including the application date, officer details, project information, and current status. Officer applications go through a workflow that may include approval or rejection by project managers. The application status is tracked through the system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OfficerApplication()
      Default constructor that initializes a new officer application with current date, PENDING status, and null officer and project references.

      • OfficerApplication

        public OfficerApplication​(java.time.LocalDate applicationDate,
                          Officer officer,
                          Project project,
                          OfficerApplicationStatusEnum status)
        Full constructor that initializes an officer application with all properties. If some parameters are null, default values are applied.
        Parameters:
        applicationDate - Date when the application was submitted
        officer - Reference to the officer who submitted the application
        project - Reference to the project the officer is applying for
        status - Current status of the application

      • OfficerApplication

        applicationDate - Date when the application was submitted
        officer - Reference to the officer who submitted the application
        project - Reference to the project the officer is applying for
        status - Current status of the application
